about.title: About TimelinePlus
about.description: About TimelinePlus - legal social media marketing services.
about.body:
TimelinePlus is a legal social media marketing services platform connecting buyers and workers through manual task completion and secure OAuth linking.

We provide transparent workflows: buyers create campaigns, workers follow instructions and submit proof, and admins manually review proofs for eligibility before crediting wallets and approving withdrawals.

Automation, scraping, or credential sharing is strictly prohibited. We use OAuth read-only linking where available to verify accounts without storing passwords.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.body:
By using TimelinePlus, you agree to follow our platform rules. You must not use bots, scraping tools, or share account credentials. Tasks must be completed manually and honestly.

TimelinePlus may suspend or ban accounts that violate these terms. Withdrawals and transactions are subject to admin review.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: Privacy policy and data handling at TimelinePlus.
privacy.body:
We collect minimal personal information required to operate the service (email, username, transaction records). When you link a social account using OAuth, we only request read-only profile information necessary to validate proofs.

We never ask for or store social account passwords. Data is used for platform operation, payments, and support; we do not share personal data with third parties except when required by law.

contact.title: Contact TimelinePlus
